# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
using Printf

function wrap_string(s::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = join(l->l*text_width, split(s, " ", keep=true))
    if length(lines) == 0
        return ""
    end
    last = lines[1]
    for l in lines[2:end]
        if isempty(last)
            last = l
        else
            last = last * " " * l
        end
        if length(last) > text_width
            printf("%s\n", last)
            last = l
        end
    end
    return last
end

@show wrap_string("Hello world")
```
